oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Testing Pomeron flavour symmetry with diffractive W charge asymmetry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chuinard, Annabelle
Royon, Christophe
Staszewski, Rafal
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Phenomenology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study focuses on hard diffractive events produced in proton-proton collision at LHC exhibiting one intact proton in the final state which can be tagged by forward detectors. We report prospective results on the W boson charge asymmetry measured for such events, which allow to constrain the quark diffractive density functions in the Pomeron.
Comment: 17 pages, 8 figures, Submitted to JHEP
